topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a2e81a6368721335001187#post_55a2e81a6368721335001187
[bq="Gizoid101"]"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a2e72c636872764200021e#post_55a2e72c636872764200021e
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a2e6bc6368722eaa0004c6#post_55a2e6bc6368722eaa0004c6
Kyubey is an alien!?

So there's like a shit ton of him?

Dayum.

[/bq]
@Oh shit@
@Is the end of the world@[/bq]
Massive spoiler:
[spoiler]
In the final movie you find out that there's a metric shit ton of them.  The way Homura defeats them is that she kills all the Kyuubey she can find and then uses the last one she can find as a slave to rat out any of them that survive.  When you get down to it she literally tortures Kyuubey for all of eternity and awards him for ratting out the any other Kyuubey by not torturing him.

The devil analogy is really accurate here.
[/spoiler]
